snippet: With players like Roger Clemens, Sammy Sosa and Barry Bonds set to appear on ballots this year, the Hall of Fame announced a new program to educate teenagers and young adults about the dangers of performance-enhancing drugs.
abstract: With players like Roger Clemens, Sammy Sosa and Barry Bonds set to appear on ballots this year, the Hall of Fame announced a new program to educate teenagers and young adults about the dangers of performance-enhancing drugs.

headline.main: Hall of Fame Begins Education Program on Banned Drugs
